oai_dc:dc.dc:title: What is TP Organics?
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Cuoco, Eduardo
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Technology transfer
Research communication and quality
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
TP Organics is one of the 38 reconised European Technology Platforms, the only one for organic, agro-ecological and low-input food and farming research.
European Technology Platforms (ETPs) are industry-led stakeholder fora that develop short to long-term research and innovation agendas and roadmaps for action at EU and national level to be supported by both private and public funding.
